CHAP at the 62nd Annual Meeting of the Biophysical Society

Jan 26, 2018 â€¢ CHAP

CHAP will be introduced at the 62nd Annual Meeting of the Biophysical Society on February 18 in San Francisco. Visit poster boards B447 and B448 between 1:45 pm and 3:45 pm for an introduction to the software and an overview of recent results.
